name: Watermelon Catch!
description:
Help Sawyer the French Bulldog catch his number one food: watermelons!  

Tap to make Sawyer jump, then time your jumps as the watermelon slices fall from the sky to catch them.  Too soon or too late and you'll miss them!  Simple to pick up, fun to master.

Watch out!  The watermelons become unpredictable, and changing winds will keep you on your toes.

Includes a mode for the kids so they can join in on the fun.

Features:
* FREE and No Ads!
* One adorable French Bulldog
* Simple and addicting game play
* One tap control
* Increasing level of difficulty
* Unique twists: watermelon slices drop from multiple positions and get affected by wind
* Easy Mode: extra chances and slower speed
* Kids Mode: no game over!

Creator's note:
This game was made in the memory of my late beloved Frenchie Sawyer and one of the things he loved to do the most.  I hope it brings you as much joy as he did for me :)
